flavor: "I am the chooser of the slain."
name: Valkyrie
text: Death Perception — Hero Action: Play the set-aside Death-Glow upgrade as if it were in your hand.

name: Brunnhilde
text: Setup: Set the Death Glow upgrade aside, out of play. "Not this Day." — Action: Detach Death-Glow and set it aside, out of play.

name: Death-Glow
text: Attach to an enemy. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy is defeated, set this card aside, out of play. If Valkyrie defeated that enemy, ready her.

flavor: "I've got friends on Earth who could use some help."
name: Annabelle Riggs
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Annabelle Riggs → search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Valkyrie card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the rest back into your deck.

name: Valhalla
text: Response: After Valkyrie attacks and defeats the enemy that has Death-Glow attached, exhaust Valhalla → draw 1 card and heal 1 damage from Valkyrie.

name: Valkyrie's Spear
text:
Restricted.
Valkyrie gets +1 DEF (+2 DEF instead while defending against the enemy with Death Glow attached).

flavor: "Dragonfang strikes swiftly and deep. You might be wise to surrender." —Valkyrie
name: Dragonfang
text:
Restricted.
Valkyrie gets +1 ATK (+2 ATK instead while attacking the enemy with Death-Glow attached).

flavor: "A fearless beast. If by his life or death he can save us all, he will." —Valkyrie
name: Aragorn
text: You get +4 hit points and gains the [[aerial]] trait.

flavor: The Valkyrior carry the spirits of fallen warriors to Valhalla, if they be worthy.
name: Flight of the Valkyrie
text: Response: After the enemy with Death-Glow is defeated, discard Flight of the Valkyrior → remove 5 threat from a scheme.

flavor: As One of the Valkyrior, Valkyrie can open a portal to Valhalla whenever she wishes.
name: Visit Valhalla
text: Alter-Ego Action: Return a Valkyrie card from your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: "Your time has come. Die with honor." —Valkyrie
name: Chooser of the Slain
text: Hero Action: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and put it into play engaged with you → draw 2 cards.

name: Shieldmaiden
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When the enemy with Death-Glow attached attacks, declare Valkyrie the defender without exhausting her. She gets +2 DEF for this attack.

name: Have at Thee!
text: Hero Action(attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If that enemy has Death-Glow attached, this attack gains overkill.

name: Thor
text: Toughness. Interrupt: When Thor attacks a minion engaged with a player, spend a [energy] resource → resolve this attack against each minion engaged with that player (in the order of your choice).

name: Throg
text: Response: After Throg enters play, give him a tough status card if you are engaged with a minion.

name: Quick Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal damage to an enemy equal to your ATK.

name: Smash the Problem
text: Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust your hero → remove threat from a scheme equal to your hero's ATK.

flavor: "I know we're Guardians of the Galaxy, but we prefer shooting to being shot at." —Rocket Raccoon
name: The Best Defense…
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, use its ATK instead of its DEF for this attack.

name: The Bifrost
text: Play only if your identity has the [[asgard]] trait. Action: Exhaust The Bifrost → search your deck for an [[asgard]] ally and play it (paying its cost). Shuffle your deck.

name: Godllike Stamina
text: Play only if your identity has the [[asgard]] trait. Action: Heal 2 damage from your identity. You may discard a status card from your identity.

name: Problem Solvers
text: Alliance. Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust an [[avenger]] character and a [[guardian]] character → remove X threat from each scheme, where X is equal to the combined THW of those characters.

name: Leadership Training
text: Max 2 per deck. Uses (2 training counters). Alter-ego Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 training counter from it → choose a leadership (blue) event in you discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Anticipation
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Interrupt: When you engage a minion, discard this card → ready your hero.

name: Cosmic Alliance
text: Alliance. (The players can pay this card's costs as a group.) Hero Action: Choose an [[avenger]] character and a [[guardian]] character → ready each of those characters.
